name: Farm Frenzy 3: Village Lite
description:
Help Scarlett feed the astronauts some delicious food that is truly out of this world in Farm Frenzy 3: Russian Village! Assist her in her daily routine that involves feeding the animals, making delicious tasting goodies, and selling her things at the market. The food the astronauts are eating is downright disgusting…help Scarlett right this wrong today!

GAME FEATURES:

◇ 90 awesome levels!
◇ Tons of lovable livestock!
◇ New “super” animals that are sure to lend a helping paw!
◇ A plethora of buildings to create!
◇ Awesome upgrades to speed up the creation process!
◇ Earn amazing achievements!
